Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert in generating report of aircraft's accident. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to make report that describe about accident occurred with aircraft.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write an aircraft accident's report using the questions and answers above and include all the details. Give in detail report of accident:

QApair.Question: How frequently do you gamble?
QApair.Answer: I gamble twice in a week.

QApair.Question: What type of gambling do you do?
QApair.Answer: I gamble on sports and casino games but mostly I gamble online.

QApair.Question: How much money do you spend on gambling?
QApair.Answer: I spend $1500 on gambling every week.

QApair.Question: What are the reasons that you gamble?
QApair.Answer: I gamble for entertainment and to make money. Sometimes I gamble because of social events and for friends.

QApair.Question: What are the consequences of your gambling?
QApair.Answer: I have lost a lot of money because of gambling and it has caused arguments with my family. I have also missed work and other important commitments because of gambling. I'm not able to give proper time for my hobby, too.

QApair.Question: What are the triggers that make you gamble?
QApair.Answer: I gamble when I am bored, when I am feeling down, or when I have had a few drinks or sometimes when I am not in mood to talk with anybody.

QApair.Question: What are the things that you have done to stop gambling?
QApair.Answer: I have tried to set limits on myself but I have not been able to stick to them. I have also tried to keep myself busy so that I don't think about gambling but that has not worked either. I have also changed my residence area, that is far from casino but still I do gamble.

QApair.Question: What is your biggest challenge in preventing gambling addiction?
QApair.Answer: I think my biggest challenge is that I enjoy gambling and it is something that I really like to do. It is hard for me to stay away from it even though I know it is not good for me.

QApair.Question: What support do you need to prevent gambling addiction?
QApair.Answer: I need support from my family and friends to help me stay away from gambling. I also need to find other things to do that I enjoy so that I don't think about gambling all the time.

Instances.Output: The best way to prevent gambling addiction is to be aware of the reasons why you gamble and to make sure that you only gamble when you can afford to lose the money. It is also important to set limits on how much you gamble and to stick to those limits. If you find that you are struggling to control your gambling, it is important to seek help from family and friends or from a support group.

QApair.Question: How frequently do you gamble?
QApair.Answer: I gamble every day.

QApair.Question: What type of gambling do you do?
QApair.Answer: I gamble on sports and that are mostly online gamble platforms.

QApair.Answer: I spend $100 on gambling every month.

QApair.Question: What are the reasons that you gamble?
QApair.Answer: I gamble to make money and I love to gamble.

QApair.Question: What are the consequences of your gambling?
QApair.Answer: I just spent most of my free time in gambling.

QApair.Question: What are the triggers that make you gamble?
QApair.Answer: I gamble when I am happy and I just love to do it. It becomes my routine.

QApair.Question: What are the things that you have done to stop gambling?
QApair.Answer: I had not do anything yet. I just love to gamble and gamble, that's it.

QApair.Question: What is your biggest challenge in preventing gambling addiction?
QApair.Answer: I think my biggest challenge is that I enjoy gambling and it is something that I really like to do. It is hard for me to stay away from it even though I know it is not good for me.

QApair.Question: What support do you need to prevent gambling addiction?
QApair.Answer: I just don't know.

Instances.Output: It is important to be aware of the reasons why you gamble and the triggers that make you gamble. If you gamble to make money, you should find another hobby or activity that you enjoy that can also make you money. If you enjoy gambling, you should set limits on how much time and money you spend on gambling activities. It is also important to have a support system in place to help you stay away from gambling.

QApair.Question: How frequently do you gamble?
QApair.Answer: I gamble once in a month.

QApair.Question: What type of gambling do you do?
QApair.Answer: I gamble in casino.

QApair.Question: How much money do you spend on gambling?
QApair.Answer: I spend $500 on gambling every month.

QApair.Question: What are the reasons that you gamble?
QApair.Answer: I just gamble to spent some good time with my friends.

QApair.Question: What are the consequences of your gambling?
QApair.Answer: I just spent good time with friends and love it.

QApair.Question: What are the triggers that make you gamble?
QApair.Answer: I just love to spend time with friends so I just spent time in casino and I gamble.

QApair.Question: What are the things that you have done to stop gambling?
QApair.Answer: I did not do anything yet.

QApair.Question: What is your biggest challenge in preventing gambling addiction?
QApair.Answer: I think my biggest challenge is that I just enjoy spending time and gambling with friends so I just can't avoid gambling.

QApair.Question: What support do you need to prevent gambling addiction?
QApair.Answer: I just don't know.

Instances.Output: The best way to prevent gambling addiction is to be aware of the reasons why you gamble. If you gamble to spend time with friends, try to find other activities that you can do together that don't involve gambling. If you gamble because you love the thrill of the game, try to find other ways to get that thrill, such as through sports or other activities. If you gamble because you're trying to make money, you should find another way to make money that doesn't involve gambling. Finally, if you have a gambling problem, you should seek help from a support group or counselor.
